# Brigo â€” AI Study App, Flashcard Maker & Exam Predictor

> Brigo is an AI study app that helps students ace their exams. It predicts exam questions, generates smart flashcards, turns notes into podcasts, and gives you a 24/7 AI tutor. Available on iOS and coming soon to Android.

## Features

- **Exam Predictor**: AI predicts your likely exam questions with high accuracy based on your course material.
- **Notes to Podcasts**: Turn your notes, PDFs, or YouTube links into audio summaries. Listen while you walk, gym, or commute.
- **Smart Flashcards**: AI generates flashcards from your material. Uses spaced repetition so you never forget.
- **Adaptive Quizzes**: Practice tests that adapt to your knowledge level. Find your weak spots fast.
- **24/7 AI Tutor**: Get instant answers, explanations, and step-by-step guides anytime.

## Who is Brigo for?

- University and college students preparing for exams
- Students who want to study smarter, not harder
- Auditory learners who prefer listening over reading
- Anyone looking for AI-powered homework help and active recall tools

## How it works

1. Upload your notes, slides, or paste a YouTube link
2. Brigo's AI breaks it down into flashcards, quizzes, and audio summaries
3. Study with spaced repetition and active recall to lock it in
4. Use the exam predictor to focus on what matters most

## Keywords

AI study app, flashcard maker, flashcard generator, exam prediction app, study app, notes to podcast, spaced repetition app, active recall, AI tutor, adaptive quiz, best study app, homework help, study tools, student productivity app, revision app, exam prep app
